DOC.HEADLINE: MINDY POMPER RECEIVES DEAN FILM GRANT AWARD
DOC.TEXT: The Roy W . Dean Film Grant Award was presented to Mindy Pomper for " Trailblazers : Unsung Military Heroines of World_War_II " on Aug . 11 during ceremonies held at the Directors Guild of America . The $ 15 # 000 prize is awarded to aspiring documentary filmmakers , and the winner and four finalists were chosen from more_than 7 # 000 submissions . The four finalists included : Arledge Armenaki for " The Big Struggle , " Zelmer Bothic for " People United , " Pamela Beere Briggs for " Women of Mystery " and Julia McCamy Tell for " What Is God ? "
